reference: Goldstein, Morris, David Folkerts-Landau, Peter Garber, Liliana Rojas-Suarez, and Michael Spencer, 1993, International Capital Markets, Parts I and II, The International Monetary Fund, Washington D.C.
Hodrick, Robert J., 1987, The Empirical Evidence on the Efficiency of Forward and Futures Foreign Exchange Markets (Harwood, London).
Lyons, Richard. K., 1993, Tests of microstructural hypotheses in the foreign exchange market, NBER Working Paper 4471, forthcoming in the Journal of Financial Economics.
